ComicInfo.Summary:
It's MAD's 300th issue! And, of course, you'll find our typical stupidity, mocking Gone with the Wind, Dick Tracy, The Wizard of Oz, and Casablanca!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:04:09. [Issue ID 74486]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/mad-300-300th-issue-special/4000-74486/
